revision.text: Possibly: A discourse of the pastoral care, by Gilbert Burnet. (London : Printed for J. Walthoe, sen. J.J. and P. Knapton, D. Midwinter, A. Bettesworth and C. Hitch [and 4 others in London], 1736.) http://www.worldcat.org/oclc/877148318
